body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, firefighter and soldier. Married to Sally Ridleburg Beck in Louisville on August 18, 1861. Father of Lorena Beck, Kate Beck, and Louisa Beck. Firefighter in Louisville in 1860. Private in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) from December 14, 1861 to January 14, 1865.
